Effect List

These are the post-processing effects that are available in the Universal Render Pipeline (URP):

  • Bloom

  • Channel Mixer

  • Chromatic Aberration

  • Color Adjustments

  • Color Curves

  • Depth of Field

  • Film Grain

  • Lens Distortion

  • Lift Gamma Gain

  • Motion Blur

  • Panini Projection

  • Shadows Midtones Highlights

  • Split Toning

  • Tonemapping

  • Vignette

  • White Balance

  • Lens Flare
